title: Enforce Parking Violation
description: A property inspection reveals a tenant is parking an unauthorized vehicle in a designated spot. The PM must enforce the rules.

tasks.description: Identify the vehicle and the tenant associated with the parking spot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the vehicle is not registered with the office and identifies the tenant leasing the spot.

tasks.description: Issue a formal parking violation notice and place it on the vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: A standard violation sticker or notice is generated.

tasks.description: Log the violation, including a photo, in the tenant's record in the property management software.
tasks.expected_outcome: The violation is documented with evidence in the tenant's file.
